metadata.title: CVE-2019-17451 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. It is an integer overflow leading to a SEGV in _bfd_dwarf2_find_nearest_line in dwarf2.c, as demonstrated by nm.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-5ubuntu1').
